p: Data on the study (year, country, authorship, journal, study design and number of participants), demographic characteristics (glomerulonephritis status, age, sex, ethnicity, and pathological type of renal biopsy), intervention details (provider, doses and modalities of treatment, placebo group set up, duration of intervention, follow-up interval and follow-up duration), and outcomes (including laboratory reports: complete remission (CR) and partial remission (PR) of proteinuria; estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR); HBeAg clearance; adherence status and adverse drug reactions) were extracted from eligible articles independently by Baohui Fu and Yue Ji.
